code: import React,{useContext,useEffect}from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{SocketContext}from'../../../SocketContext';import CurrentDateTime from'../CurrentDateTime.js';import'./Footer.css';import{updateJetsonConnection}from'../../../actions/livePage/vehicleDynamicsActions';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Footer(){var socket=useContext(SocketContext);var jetson_connection=useSelector(function(state){return state.vehicleDynamics.jetsonConnection;});var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){window.localStorage.setItem('jetson-connection',jetson_connection);socket.on('jetson_connection',function(data){window.localStorage.setItem('jetson-connection',data);dispatch(updateJetsonConnection(data));});},[jetson_connection,socket,dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:"footer py-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex flex-wrap justify-content-between container-fluid align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center d-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CurrentDateTime,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ml-2",children:"70\xB0F"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center",children:["Jetson: ",jetson_connection]})]})});}export default Footer;
